page.title: 14A27
page.content: Travelling West, the A27 enters our area in block (31 05). Here it is called the Upper Lewes Road, where we see old terraced houses with small corner shops. After about 1/2 km, we cross traffic lights into Viaduct Road, where again small terraced houses line the route to Preston Circus. Here, er see the main Brighton Fire Station, before crossing into New England Road. After 300 ms we go under a large railway bridge. this carries the main London to Brighton railway. Immediately after the Bridge, the road forks right at traffic lights (30 05). This is the Old Shoreham Road. Continuing West, we see changes in house desin, bcoming more and more modern. The road widens, passing Hove Park (28 06), Brighton football ground and then leaving our grid at Sackville Road.
